decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement x 2, Received: 10/10/2016. D_01 Rev A, D_02 Rev A, D_03, D_04 Rev A, D_05 Rev A, P_00, P_01 Rev A, P_02 Rev A, P_03 Rev A, P_04 Rev A, P_05 Rev A, P_06 Rev A, P_07 Rev A, P_08 Rev A, P_09 Rev A, P_10 Rev A, P_11 Rev A, P_12 Rev A, Received: 19/12/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
Condition : 5 - The windows of the side dormer hereby approved shall be fitted with obscure glazing to a height of 1.75m above the internal floor level of the room that it would serve.
Condition : 6 - The planting hereby approved around the second floor terrace shall be retained on site at all times and replaced as necessary.
description: Erection of one rear and one side roof extension with one front roof window, alterations to rear facade including lowering of parapet height and installation of a balustrade, changes to existing fenestration.  Increase in width of existing vehicular access to the house.
